data.message: Hye facebook.. :D Can I need your help ? Can you verified this page ? A'N'D 艾莉兒Allie. She is a star. I hope you can help me.. Her page likers is 150,000+. thank you facebook. :*

replies.message: Hi there, Iwana. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1GLOCAv. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1GLOAsp. Hope this helps! -Kate
